name: Mini Wars Blackout
description:
Mini soldiers in epic battles! Survive the attack of countless enemies in amazing and visually impressive battle arenas, using lots of weapons, explosives and special powers.

[Features]
● Amazing sound effects to get more immersion in the game (use of headphones can improve the game immersion).
● Realistic, dynamic, physics-based battle arenas with stunning graphics.
● Challenging enemies with impressive artificial intelligence.
● Compete with friends for the higher score.

Thank you to everyone who has played Mini Wars Blackout!
